open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Elarduspark, Pretoria. Affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: MetroFibre| Centurion
open.description: We are investigating reports of slow speed and intermittent connection affecting clients on the MetroFibre network. We are working to identify and resolve this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

open.title: Vumatel| Bromhof
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Bonela, Bromhof on 2025/06/02, 14:00 to 18:00 to 2025/06/02, 16:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
